cyberware.name: Reflex Booster
cyberware.effect: Once per round, gain +1 bonus die to an Evade check.

cyberware.name: Targeting Link
cyberware.effect: Once per round, ignore 1 level of cover when attacking an enemy you can see.

cyberware.name: Low-Light Optics
cyberware.effect: Ignore penalty dice caused by darkness within medium range.

cyberware.name: EMP Shielding
cyberware.effect: Ignore the effects of EMP once per day.

cyberware.name: Metabolic Filter
cyberware.effect: Gain +1 bonus die on checks to resist toxins or narcotics.

cyberware.name: Compact Databank
cyberware.effect: Internal information storage device; store/access info at will.
